title: Use an Order Set
description: A hospitalist is admitting a patient with community-acquired pneumonia and uses a pre-built order set to place all the standard orders efficiently.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and navigate to order entry.
Search for and select the 'Community-Acquired Pneumonia Admission' order set.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician opens the order set, which contains pre-selected medications, lab tests, and nursing orders.

tasks.description: Review the pre-checked orders, make any necessary modifications, and sign the order set.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician efficiently places multiple evidence-based orders at once, improving quality and saving time.
